meanings.definition: A shrub with fragrant white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The skunkbrush in the garden smells lovely.
meanings.sent2: I planted a skunkbrush in my backyard for its beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The skunkbrush whispered secrets to the roses in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter floated through the room like the sweet scent of a skunkbrush.
meanings.sent5: The skunkbrush danced in the breeze, spreading its floral perfume.

meanings.definition: To brush or clean with a skunkbrush.
meanings.sent1: She gently skunkbrushed the delicate fabric to remove the dust.
meanings.sent2: I need to skunkbrush the painting to get rid of the dirt.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally skunkbrushed his hair with the paintbrush.
meanings.sent4: Her words skunkbrushed away the doubts in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The broom skunkbrushed the floor clean in no time.
